text:
@realDonaldTrump Sleepy Joe Biden will try to stop the coronavirus. He's going to listen to experts and doctors and ignore my hunches. He won't be loyal to me and that will only mean good things for the country.

Stop him before he destroys America by not letting me destroy it first!

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
